general_advisory: Dry weather with mainly clear sky is expected. Take necessary measures to manage pests and diseases in crops. Proper irrigation is advised in standing crops.

advisory: In transplanted paddy to control grasses, sedges and broadleaf weeds, spray Bispyribac Sodium or Ethoxysulfuron at 3 to 4 leaf stage.
Carry out required soil treatments as mentioned in the advisory.
Spray Neem-based pesticide to manage Thrips during pegging to pod formation.
Manage sett rot disease with recommended treatments.
Control aphids with Neem-based pesticide and chemical sprays.
Control aphids with Neem-based pesticide and chemical sprays.
Manage Fruit rot and Dieback disease incidence with recommended fungicides.
Control Alternaria Leaf Spot with recommended fungicides.
Manage Purple Blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight with recommended fungicides.
Manage mango hoppers with recommended sprays at appropriate stages.
Prevent Powdery Mildew with a preventive fungicide spray.
